Albania is a democratic country and aspirant to EU membership with the necessary democratic institutions in place. We therefore renew our call for constructive dialogue and compromise to resolve the existing political differences. at a Feb. 3, 2003, National Security Council meeting in which Colin Powell sketched out the presentation he was to make at the United Nations two days later. Rumsfeld quotes himself as telling the meeting: We should hit Khurmal during the speech, given that Colin Powell will talk about it. Khurmal is the name of a village near the site. , the singer may join Simon Cowell on the show when it begins filming later this year.`` To get her on the show would give it real star power,'' a source told the magazine. Nicole Scherzinger and Cheryl Cole are also being considered for places on the judging panel, because they've got a proven track record of being great judges, but that doesn't rule Rihanna out.`` She has a massive appeal and a real edge to her, they added.`` Simon Cowell knows she wouldn't be afraid to give her opinion.'' Others who have been rumoured for the show's judging panel include Will Smith , Katy Perry , Mick Jagger and Mariah Carey . This

not speak for the entire continent.`` Ironically, my comment was unintentional,'' Donald Rumsfeld writes.`` I had meant to say France and Germany represented` old NATO' not` old Europe'.'' In any event, the phrase` old Europe' entered the vernacular. The segments of Americans that preferred calling french fries` freedom fries' loved it, he writes.`` The elites in Paris and Bonn who thought themselves the guardians of a sophisticated, new world order did not. All in all I was amused by the ruckus.''

The pro-plan union members avoid the streets and meet at an auditorium to listen to their leadership.`` The crisis has been under way for three years,'' the man on the podium says. Many industries are dying, banks are holding on to their money, if nothing improves, unemployment will skyrocket this year. We want to ensure our future. That's why we broke labor unity and approved the Sergio Marchionne plan. The union that's been left alone is the powerful left-leaning metal workers. If its members don't agree to sign, Sergio Marchionne says they will lose their representation rights on the factory floor.

year under his contract with the show, he's now ready to answer that question everyone wants to ask- why would an intelligent, pleasant fellow with a refined English accent say such horrible things? Clearly it was the most stupid mistake of my life, he said.`` I was going to be Simon Cowell on steroids. The producers made it quite clear they needed confrontation. Several days into the show they complained that I wasn't giving them anything.''

NBA.com staff reports-- Allen Iverson 's season is over. The Detroit Red Pistons said Friday the All-Star guard will miss the rest of the season-- and the playoffs if they make it-- because of a sore back. After talking with Allen Iverson and our medical staff, we feel that resting Allen Iverson for the remainder of the season is the best course of action at this time, Pistons president of basketball operations Joe Dumars said in a statement released by the team.`` While he has played in our last three games, he is still feeling some discomfort and getting him physically ready to compete at

been burned for three straight games of at least 40 points by the 76ers All-Star.`` Honestly, they play me one-on-one, straight up,'' Allen Iverson said of a Bucks' defense he penetrated at will. Except in the last quarter. Elgin Baylor guess they felt like they had to do something. By then, it was too late. Allen Iverson reached 40 points against the Bucks for the sixth time in his career, his most against any opponent. He had 40 and 54 points in his previous two games
